description: Custom designed for your precious Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Tablet, this MoKo case features a combination of functionality and style. Well built to protect your Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Tablet for the years to come.Premium quality PU leather boosts a classy look.No-scratch microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection.Access to all controls and features. Device can be charged with case closed.Built-in stand with several angles: perfect whenever you type an email or watch a movie.Interior hand strap for comfortable one-handed use.Stylus loop.This product is sold exclusively by BSCstore. Only buy from BSCstore to get genuine MoKo(TM) products with Lifetime warranty and superb customer service.
